product_name: CliniqueMoisture Surge Broad Spectrum SPF 28 Sheer Hydrator Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleClinique Moisture Surge Broad Spectrum SPF 28 Sheer Hydrator is a cloud-like face moisturizer with SPF that hydrates and delivers sheer sun protection.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin TypesConcern: Dehydration, dry skin.Clinique's daily moisturizer for face with SPF 28 delivers the hydration you love from Moisture Surge, plus sheer sun protection.This cloud-like cream with Aloe Bioferment + Hyaluronic Acid Complex and provitamin D penetrates deep into skin's surface for all-day stabilizing hydration.Leaves skin hydrated and glowing‚Äînot shiny.It helps keep the sun‚Äôs glow from dulling yours. SPF 28 filters up to 96% of UV rays when used as directed.**UV rays associated with sunburn; based on SPF testing.Protecting your skin against UV rays has many benefits. UV exposure can: Exacerbate existing dark spots and trigger new ones. Speed up visible aging. Interfere with skin's natural turnover for more noticeable pores. Lead to irritation, which can leave skin looking tired.For all skin tones‚Äîeven for deep skin tones. Looks opaque going on, blends in sheer. Without a white cast, residue, or stickiness.Preps for Makeup: Lightweight moisturizer with SPF provides a smooth canvas for makeup application.Free Of: Fragrance, Parabens, Phthalates, Oil, Drying alcohol, Oxybenzone.Dermatologist tested. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.Key IngredientsAloe Bioferment + Hyaluronic Acid Complex: combines two hydrating ingredients into one powerhouse complex to help attract moisture and retain it.Aloe bioferment: Clinique scientists transformed the aloe vera plant through an exclusive fermentation process. One of the benefits of fermentation is that it breaks apart larger molecules into smaller ones, making them more easily absorbed into skin.Made with lactobacillus, activated aloe water, and responsibly sourced and certified organic aloe extract powder, this nutrient-rich ingredient helps skin retain moisture.Research ResultsAfter one use:100% instantly show a boost in hydration* and glow.**When used as directed:SPF 28 filters up to 96% of UV rays.****Clinical testing on 24 women.**Clinical testing on 27 women.***Filters UV rays associated with sunburn; based on SPF testing.Item 2604860How To UseThe formula looks opaque going on, so you can see where you apply it.Start in the center, applying at the highest points, where the sun hits first.Pat or massage outward, covering your entire face. Pat or massage in until fully sheer.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone 3.0%, Homosalate 7.0%, Octinoxate 7.0%, Octisalate 4.5%. Inactive: Water\Aqua\Eau, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycrylene, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Dextrin Palmitate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Glycerin, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Polysaccharides, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Sodium Polyaspartate, 7-Dehydrocholesterol, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates Copolymer, Sorbitol, Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Sucrose, Saccharide Isomerate, Hydroxyethyl Urea, PPG-8-Ceteth-20, Sorbeth-30 Tetraisostearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Potassium Hydroxide, Carbomer, Dipropylene Glycol, Dehydroxanthan Gum, Stearyl Alcohol, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Hexylene Glycol, Acrylates/Beheneth-25 Methacrylate Copolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Bht, Disodium Edta, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Red 4 (CI 14700).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: The formula looks opaque going on, so you can see where you apply it.Start in the center, applying at the highest points, where the sun hits first.Pat or massage outward, covering your entire face. Pat or massage in until fully sheer.

reviews.headline: This is the only moisturizer I use!
reviews.comments: Moisture surge broad spectrum goes on so smooth and a little goes a long way.  I love this product and use twice daily after washing my face.

reviews.headline: I love the Clinque Surge Moisturizers!
reviews.comments: I have been using Clinque Surge for several years exclusively. I decided to try one with SPF. Great product.

reviews.headline: New addiction
reviews.comments: This is the 1st time to try this & I love it. I always like an SPF in moisturizer year round.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer
reviews.comments: Lasts all day and works well under my face mskeup.

reviews.headline: Moisturizer is too thick for daytime.
reviews.comments: It made my face shiny and felt too heavy on my face.  Plus, it's a little pricey for a daytime lotion.

reviews.headline: My only go to!!
reviews.comments: I've worn Clinique all my adult life. I totally recommend this product with SPF, especially for us in South Texas!

reviews.headline: So creamy
reviews.comments: Love the way it feels on my face.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again.
reviews.comments: This cream goes on smooth and easy.  Leaves my skin with a nice dewy look.

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments: This is a very great moisturizer. It leaves your skin hydrated and feeling refreshed. The downside is the price.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I really didn't care for the gel in this product, but I definitely love the cream with sunscreen.  This also keeps my skin very hydrated.  I definitely would continue using this product.

reviews.headline: A little goes a long way
reviews.comments: Love Clinique products but this is one of my favorites. I live in the desert and my skin is extremely dry, even on my face. I love putting this on and then feeling that my face is still soft, hours later.

reviews.headline: It gives PURE hydration
reviews.comments: I was looking for a moisturizing product since I have oily/dry skin. I   brow tech at Ulta advised this and baabby this is what the doctor ordered for ME‚ù§

reviews.headline: enjoying it so far
reviews.comments: So far I like it. I've only gotten to wear it once and not in a 'sweaty hot' situation. I want to test it when it's hot outside and the sun is bright to make sure it works and holds up.

reviews.headline: just ok
reviews.comments: I love the moisture surge gel and was excited to try this! It goes on well and wears well under makeup with no heavy feeling or pilling. I am very fair skinned and didnt burn with this on while out in the sun for short amounts of time. However, after a couple of days of consistent use, my skin started to break out like crazy! This product is definitely not the one for me.

reviews.headline: Always peels
reviews.comments: This product always peels on my face, whether I use it on its own or with other products.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I love it

reviews.headline: This made my skin dry and peel around my nose
reviews.comments: This was the opposite of a moisturizer for me. Maybe it would be good for super oily skin but it made my skin very angry. I haven't been blowing my nose so there is no explanation besides the new product.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I love this stuff!

reviews.headline: Leaves a film behind - use sparingly
reviews.comments:
The cream is ok but leaves a thin film behind that made my (normal) skin feel tight and dry.   
If you use a smaller amount you can correct the problem, but then what's the point of the cream?

reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.comments: I've been using moisture surge for a few years now and I've never been disappointed. It works incredible and my skin feels amazing ‚Äî plus this one had SPF!!

media.headline: This made my skin dry and peel around my nose
i would buy this product again
media.caption: my opinion

faceoff_positive.comments:
CLINIQUE | MOISTURE SURGE | Broad Spectrum SPF 28 | Sheer Hydrator 
30 ml 

üåø Let me tell you all about the Clinique Moisturizer! This refreshing gel-cream is a true gem for your skincare routine. With a lightweight, oil-free texture, it's perfect for all skin types including normal, dry, combination, and oily. If dryness is your main concern, this product has got your back! 

üåø The key ingredients like Aloe Bio-ferment, Hyaluronic Acid Complex, and Vitamins C and E work together to provide up to 100 hours of hydration. üåø

üåø Not only is it free of parabens and phthalates, but it also comes in recyclable packaging, so I can feel good about my skincare choices.

üåø The Auto-Replenishing Technology helps my skin stay hydrated by creating its own internal water source, while the hyaluronic acid locks in moisture for that plump, healthy-looking skin we all crave. The aloe bio-ferment ensures optimal absorption and moisture retention, leaving your skin feeling soothed with a beautiful glow. ‚ú®

üåø And let's talk about the clinical results! In a consumer test, 99% of women said their skin felt deeply hydrated after just one week of use. 95% noticed their skin looked plump and felt healthier, while 91% said their skin was visibly glowing. 

üåø This dermatologist and allergy-tested product is fragrance-free and alcohol-free, making it suitable for even the most sensitive skin types. Plus, it's shown to prevent drying and barrier damage from prolonged mask wearing - a true lifesaver in today's world. üôå

üåø Overall, the Clinique Moisturizer is a must-have in my skincare routine if you're looking for long-lasting hydration, a smooth canvas for makeup, and healthy, glowing skin. Treat yourself to this little luxury, and your skin will thank you!
faceoff_positive.headline: Love it

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this product free to try in exchange for my honest review. The packaging is appealing. It came in a box which was the signature Clinique green color and showed what the jar would look like. The jar itself is attractive with a heavy pink glass container and a silver lid. The glass is quite thick, so I feel like there's good protection against the jar breaking if I were to accidentally drop it. There's also a plastic lid that goes directly onto the product once the jar is open to help keep it from drying out. I really wish the product came with an applicator, especially for when it starts to get towards the bottom of the jar, so I wouldn't have to scrape it from the bottom. The product itself is pretty thick and smooth. It definitely has the scent of sunscreen because of the SPF, but it's not what I would consider unpleasant. The product applies smoothly onto the skin and I didn't notice any white cast after application. The product dries down quickly enough and doesn't feel greasy or heavy on the skin. That being said, this product does not feel all that hydrating for me. Compared to some other moisturizing products I've used, this was a let down when it comes to hydration. I would definitely recommend using another moisturizer before applying this. On its own, my skin felt dry again within less than 3 hours after using this product. I also think the amount of SPF is also a letdown at only SPF 28. SPF 50 is the baseline recommendation. With the product being in the glass jar, it's not really practical to carry around with me in my purse to reapply throughout the day as recommended with SPF products. I did try wearing this under my makeup, and I didn't experience any problems with layering my makeup on top of this product. Overall, this product is decent but nothing groundbreaking. I would absolutely suggest you need to wear another moisturizer under this product. I would personally want to add additional SPF products as well for more effective coverage.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not as good as I expected

rollup.name: Moisture Surge Broad Spectrum SPF 28 Sheer Hydrator Moisturizer
